turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Google, can you order me a coffee drink from starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that 41195 Winchester Rd, Temecula California?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what drink would you love to have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok is that Iced Cappuccino with Cold Foam?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect. What Milk should we add their?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok got it Grande Iced Cappuccino with Cold Foam and almond milk added to it. What else would you love to add?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok Iced Cappuccino with Cold Foam and almond milk Grande will be ready in Winchester Rd, Temecula in about 7 minutes from now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No probelm Kevin, Your drink will be ready for pick up in 7 minutes and your receipts will be sent via text message.
